Posts.Content: On Jun 23, 2007 12:00 AM Cookiemouse wrote: My mom is on her 5th round of chemo and they are using Methotrixiate in high dosage, Mitomycin, 5 FU, Oxaliplatin and Leucovorin.  They are also alternating Erbitux with Avastin.  Anybody ever heard of that regimen? It's a heavy combination (one week in the hospital and one week as an outpatient) and is wreaking havoc on her platelet count.  Any suggestions? Hello I was reading your post and was wondering how your mom is doing now. Any information is appreciated as I too am fighting stage 4 colon cancer. Thank you, Linda
Posts.Title: anyone had methotrixiate or mitomycin for stage 4 colon cancer
